subject_terms_3: Bose, Subhas Chandra Indian National Army (Singapore) Indian National Army Monument Site periodicals
physical_appearance: This clipping is a page from the periodical 'The Orient Illustrsted Weekly' published on 10 February 1946. The title is printed at the top of the page. This page features six photographs with captions at the bottom. The edges of the page are slightly torn, especially on the left, with folded edges on the right.
sgcool_label_text: "Prior to the World War II period, Indians in Singapore and Malaya retained strong political, sentimental and economic ties with their home country. Anti-colonial thoughts and actions, inspired by the ""call for freedom"" in India
title_text: The Orient Shah Nawaz in Netaji's Room
